channel.title: Emote
channel.description: Can anyone tell me the correct Emote for obby rings? Dont think ive seen this on ANY server at all...

item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Alright thanks

item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

stillgfx(gfx id, other players x, other players y);

May have to switch around the x and y coords …

Read full topic

item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:12, topic:147160”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=201216.msg1787101#msg1787101 date=1191040147]
Dont think ive seen this on ANY server at all…
[/quote]

I already have it on my server.

3353 emote
442 gfx[/quote]

Thanks v much ;)… 1 more thing, how would i make it so, it does a gfx on the other player when attacked with a certain wep :|?

Read full topic

item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I already have a gfx list… Can’t find it.

[quote=“iceman327, post:1, topic:147165”][quote author=ownage plz link=topic=201216.msg1787132#msg1787132 date=1191040842]
You want the emote or the gfx … ?
[/quote]

ownage plz I was wondering if you have a list of the gfx’s because im trying to make a spell like that holyforce one, and I can’t find the right ones to make it
any help?[/quote]

Please, only post if your gonna help

Read full topic

item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:7, topic:147160”]GFXlist

[code]GFX ID = Description

0 = tripple dragon breath
1 = single dragon breath
2 = huge white breath
3 = huge green breath
4 = lots of purple spikes ( like delright when defeated )
5 = purple spikes doing down ( delright dying )
6 = like teleport, only slower and more opaque
7 = small purple dot, explodes into huge, then gets small
8 = vines like at draynor manner ( they atk you )
18 = iron arrows draw back
19 = bronze arrow draw back
20 = steel arrow draw back
21 = mith arrow draw back
22 = addy arrow draw back
23 = iron again?
24 = rune arrow draw back
25 = ice arrow draw back
26 = fire arrow draw
28 = cross-bow bolt
29 = rotten tomatoe - projectile
30 = rotten tomatoe - throw
31 = rotten tomatoe - contact with target
35 = iron throw axe
36 = bronze throw axe
37 = steel throwing axe
38 = mith throwing axe
39 = addy throwing axe
40 = bronze throwing axe again?
41 = rune throwing axe
49-52 = something with a grey vial
54 = giant blast

58 = giant cage door - up
59 = GIANT WHIRLPOOL
60 = rocks falling
61 = giant log swinging
62 = spikes coming out of a wall trap
65 = floor trap - hit
66 = floor trap - receeding
67 = long rape or pole shooting throw you
68 = huge splash - water
69 = huge splash - orange
76 = saradomin strike
77 = claws of guthix
78 = flames of zamorak

80 = ‘stun’ birdies above head

113 = high alchemy
